summary.para: Identifies a type of alpha texture.

remarks.para: An alpha texture is a bitmap of alpha values, each representing opacity of a pixel or subpixel.

summary.para: Specifies an alpha texture for aliased text rendering (that is, each pixel is either fully opaque or fully transparent), with one byte per pixel.
Specifies an alpha texture for ClearType text rendering, with three bytes per pixel in the horizontal dimension and one byte per pixel in the vertical dimension.
